sentences.en: " I pledge before God I didn't do it,'said the old man.

sentences.en: He asked her to pledge the house as security for a loan.
sentences.cn: 他要她抵押房子作为贷款担保。

sentences.en: He would keep his pledge to the utmost of his power.
sentences.cn: 他将极力信守他的誓言.

sentences.en: His tax-cutting pledge brought a delirious crowd to their feet.
sentences.cn: 他减税的承诺让亢奋的人群欢呼雀跃起来。

sentences.en: I have left the watch as pledge for borrowed money.
sentences.cn: 我留下这块手表作为借款的抵押物.

sentences.en: I pledge that by next year we will have the problem solved.
sentences.cn: 我保证来年之前我们将解决这个问题。

sentences.en: I pledge you my words.
sentences.cn: 我向你保证说话算数.

sentences.en: I will pledge myself to a top secret.

sentences.en: In the treaty both sides pledge to respect human rights.
sentences.cn: 双方在条约中都承诺将尊重人权。

sentences.cn: 她留下她的金手镯作抵押品.

sentences.en: The agreement includes a pledge of non-aggression.
sentences.cn: 协议包括不发动侵略的保证。

sentences.en: The meeting ended with a pledge to step up cooperation between the six states of the region.
sentences.cn: 会议以加快该地区6个州之间合作的承诺结束。

sentences.en: The old man is willing to pledge for him.

sentences.en: The pledge has long since run out.

sentences.en: There hangs straight on the wall of this grocery a service pledge.
sentences.cn: 这家副食店在墙上端端正正挂着一张服务公约.

sentences.en: They have truly lived up to their pledge.
sentences.cn: 他们确实照他们的誓言做了.
